Name: ★ Fallalypse ★
About the game: A group of terrorists has arranged a nuclear hell and occupied Fort. You’ll have to build your own base in the new world burnt by the nuclear apocalypse. Build your base, eliminate zombies, attack convoys to get resources, fight against other players in PvP, use machinery to kill enemies. You can protect your base or travel the map in search of resources. Controller Support:
